issue.title: [R] Add str() methods to objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8718](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8718). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Apparently this will make the RStudio IDE show useful things in the environment panel. Probably this is most useful for Table, RecordBatch, and Dataset (and maybe Schema, which would look similar).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8718?focusedCommentId=17137844) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
We can add the methods, but the desired IDE behavior is blocked. See https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio/issues/7147.
